content.rendered:
This year’s Justice by Design challenge at Osgoode Hall Law School saw three LAWS Alum participating.

Check out one of their collaborative projects, and start to envision the court house of the future.

http://www.canadianlawyermag.com/5749/The-courthouse-of-the-future.html

excerpt.rendered: This year’s Justice by Design challenge at Osgoode Hall Law School saw three LAWS Alum participating. Check out one of their collaborative projects, and start to envision the court house…
